# dataSource

**Instance Property**

The data source provided by the app.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var dataSource: (any MPPlayableContentDataSource)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property ensures support for random access of media items through the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPPlayableContentDataSource] protocol, whose methods are callable at any point during the app’s lifetime. Set this property as soon as the data is available.

## Providing playable content

- **MPPlayableContentDataSource**: The data source providing media metadata to external media players so they can build user interfaces displaying your app’s content.
